org.finra.herd.rest

Class SecurityFunctionRestController

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.finra.herd.rest.SecurityFunctionRestController

  • @RestController
 @RequestMapping(value="/rest",
                produces={"application/xml","application/json"})
public class SecurityFunctionRestController
extends Object
    The REST controller that handles security function REST requests.

    • Method Detail

      • createSecurityFunction

        @RequestMapping(value="/securityFunctions",
                method=POST,
                consumes={"application/xml","application/json"})
 @Secured(value="FN_SECURITY_FUNCTIONS_POST")
public SecurityFunction createSecurityFunction(@RequestBody
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       SecurityFunctionCreateRequest request)
        Creates a new security function.
        Parameters:
        request - the information needed to create a security function
        Returns:
        the created security function

      • deleteSecurityFunction

        @RequestMapping(value="/securityFunctions/{securityFunctionName}",
                method=DELETE)
 @Secured(value="FN_SECURITY_FUNCTIONS_DELETE")
public SecurityFunction deleteSecurityFunction(@PathVariable(value="securityFunctionName")
                                                                                                                                                                                                 String securityFunctionName)
        Deletes an existing security function by security function name.
        Parameters:
        securityFunctionName - the security function name
        Returns:
        the deleted security function

      • getSecurityFunction

        @RequestMapping(value="/securityFunctions/{securityFunctionName}",
                method=GET)
 @Secured(value="FN_SECURITY_FUNCTIONS_GET")
public SecurityFunction getSecurityFunction(@PathVariable(value="securityFunctionName")
                                                                                                                                                                                        String securityFunctionName)
        Retrieves an existing security function by security function name.
        Parameters:
        securityFunctionName - the security function name
        Returns:
        the retrieved security function

      • getSecurityFunctions

        @RequestMapping(value="/securityFunctions",
                method=GET)
 @Secured(value="FN_SECURITY_FUNCTIONS_ALL_GET")
public SecurityFunctionKeys getSecurityFunctions()
        Gets a list of security function keys for all security functions defined in the system. The result list is sorted by security function name in ascending order.
        Returns:
        the list of security function keys
